Reviews.Title: For the prize it's a good phone.
Reviews.Author: Luis Perez
Reviews.Content: Someone came in to the store trying to sell me this phone,  thought it was a galaxy note at first glance, but then I notice it wasn't. I typed *#06# to check if the imei number was blacklisted, but to my surprise it had two imdi numbers available. Then again it is a 2 sim card slot phone for apparently any network. The phone seemed to work fine and made calls using a t-mobile sim card. Well either way, from what I saw while using it for the 10 minutes I was looking through the phone, this phone sims like a good deal since it's network free and runs on android 4.2.2 OS.
